import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={employees:[]};export var employeeSlice=createSlice({name:'employees',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setEmployees:function setEmployees(state,action){// redux toolkit allows us to write mutating logic in the reducers
state.employees=action.payload;},setEmployee:function setEmployee(state,action){var payload=action.payload;state.employee=payload;},addingEmployee:function addingEmployee(state,_ref){var employee=_ref.payload;state.employees.push(employee);},updatingEmployee:function updatingEmployee(state,_ref2){var employee=_ref2.payload;var indexToUpdate=state.employees.findIndex(function(e){return e.id===employee.id;});if(indexToUpdate>=0){state.employees[indexToUpdate]=employee;}state.employee=employee;},removeEmployee:function removeEmployee(state,_ref3){var id=_ref3.payload;var indexToDelete=state.employees.findIndex(function(e){return e.id===id;});if(indexToDelete>=0){state.employees.splice(indexToDelete,1);}}}});var _employeeSlice$action=employeeSlice.actions,setEmployees=_employeeSlice$action.setEmployees,setEmployee=_employeeSlice$action.setEmployee,addingEmployee=_employeeSlice$action.addingEmployee,updatingEmployee=_employeeSlice$action.updatingEmployee,removeEmployee=_employeeSlice$action.removeEmployee;export{setEmployees,setEmployee,addingEmployee,updatingEmployee,removeEmployee};export default employeeSlice.reducer;
